rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be used once by a player to feed any (or all) bunnies in the Bunny Circle any amounts of Cabbage and Water.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: When all the carrots are taken from Kaballaâ€™s Market the game is over and The Magic Carrot is revealed.

rules.title: Card Text
rules.text: May be placed on any Bunny which must feed the amounts rolled by the end of its next turn or die.
